name: A White-Bunny - Bunny-Hop Adventures
description:
In White Bunny, you follow the adventures of the hopping white bunny as it travels through the mystical and magical land that is the Pink Forest. The Pink Forest is filled with fruits and veggies! But watch out for the black bunny, White Bunny's evil twin!

Collect carrots and power ups to help you along the way! Shoot fireballs at your enemies and go as far as you can with slipping into the pits!

This is a game that both kids and the whole family can enjoy! It's addicting and simple to play! Just tap on the left side (or A) to jump and on the right side (or B) to fire!

• Cute graphics!
• Addicting gameplay!
• Simple controls!
• Collect carrots and power ups!
• Fun music and sounds!
